attributes.action: stop being over sensitive with minorities and promote the british way of life
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I want an end to being overly sensitive to people who wish to abuse the British Way of life by demanding we change our ways. I want all newcomers to this country to accept the british way of life, language and dress. To also acknowledge the main faith of this country is Christianity and if newcomers break our laws they are deported back to their country of origin

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
